column6: The Marauders' trap closes on the X-Men - from within and from without!  But devastating though it is, this attack is only a move in a larger game - and the survivors of Rogue's team have to figure out what the objective is before they can have a prayer of fighting back...
column8: | writer:Mike Carey | colorist:Edgar Delgado | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Humberto Ramos | inker:Tim Townsend
